trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format" /> and <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse" /> events.
trans-unit.target: 提供有关 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format" /> 和 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse" /> 事件的数据。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs> is used to format and unformat values displayed by a Windows Forms control that is bound to data through a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs>用于格式化和取消它们绑定到通过数据的 Windows 窗体控件所显示的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format> event occurs whenever a control property is bound to a value and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse> event occurs whenever the bound value changes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format>事件时发生此事件的控件属性绑定到一个值和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse>每当绑定的值更改时发生的事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse> events allow you to create custom formats for displaying data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse>事件允许你创建自定义格式来显示数据。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the data in a table is of type <xref:System.Decimal>, you can specify that the data should be displayed in the local currency format--by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs> to the formatted value in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format> event.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果表中的数据的类型<xref:System.Decimal>，你可以指定该数据应在本地货币的格式-显示通过设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs>到中的格式化值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format>事件。

trans-unit.source: You must consequently unformat the displayed value in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse> event.
trans-unit.target: 因此必须取消它们中的显示的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse>事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>, adds a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventHandler> delegate to both the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format> events, and uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DataBindings%2A> property to add the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection> of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>，将添加<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventHandler>委托<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format>事件，并使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DataBindings%2A>属性来添加<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控件。

trans-unit.source: The `DecimalToCurrencyString` event delegate, which is added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format> event, uses the <xref:System.Decimal.ToString%2A> method to format the bound value (a <xref:System.Decimal> type) as currency.
trans-unit.target: `DecimalToCurrencyString`添加到的事件委托<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format>事件，使用<xref:System.Decimal.ToString%2A>方法来设置格式的绑定的值 (<xref:System.Decimal>类型) 为货币。

trans-unit.source: The `CurrencyStringToDecimal` event delegate, which is added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse> event, converts the value displayed by the control back to the <xref:System.Decimal> type.
trans-unit.target: `CurrencyStringToDecimal`添加到的事件委托<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse>事件，将由控件显示的值转换回<xref:System.Decimal>类型。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that contains the value of the current property.
trans-unit.target: 包含当前属性值的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the value.
trans-unit.target: 值的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets the data type of the desired value.
trans-unit.target: 获取所需值的数据类型。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the desired value.
trans-unit.target: 所需值的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.DesiredType%2A> property enables you to check the type of the property that the value is being converted to.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.DesiredType%2A>属性使您能够检查的值转换为属性的类型。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.DesiredType%2A> property to determine whether the conversion of one type to another can proceed.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.DesiredType%2A>属性来确定是否可以继续执行到另一种类型的转换。

trans-unit.source: The `DecimalToCurrencyString` method tests whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.DesiredType%2A> is a string.
trans-unit.target: `DecimalToCurrencyString`方法测试是否<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.DesiredType%2A>是一个字符串。

trans-unit.source: If not, the code exits the method.
trans-unit.target: 否则，在代码退出该方法。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the `CurrencyStringToDecimal` method tests whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.DesiredType%2A> is a <xref:System.Decimal>, and exits if it is not `true`.
trans-unit.target: 同样，`CurrencyStringToDecimal`方法测试是否<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.DesiredType%2A>是<xref:System.Decimal>，并退出如果还没有`true`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs" /> 的值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs" /> 的值。

trans-unit.source: The value contained by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> property depends on the event in which the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs> is returned.
trans-unit.target: 所包含的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A>属性取决于在其中事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs>返回。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs> can be returned in either the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format> event or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs>可以在返回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format>事件或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse>事件。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs> is returned in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format> event, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> property contains the unformatted property value of the data source.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs>中返回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format>事件，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A>属性包含的数据源的未格式化的属性值。

trans-unit.source: Within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format> event, you can read the property value, format the value, and reset the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> property to the new (formatted) value, thereby setting the value displayed in the data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format>事件，你可以读取属性值、 格式化值，以及重置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A>为新的 （格式化） 值，从而将数据绑定控件中显示的值的属性。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs> is returned in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse> event, the property contains the custom-formatted value of the data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs>中返回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse>事件，该属性包含数据绑定控件的自定义格式的值。

trans-unit.source: Within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse> event, you must read the formatted value, parse it, and convert it back to the same data type as the data source.
trans-unit.target: 在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse>事件，你必须读取格式化的值、 分析它，并将其转换回数据源与相同数据类型。

trans-unit.source: You can then reset the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> property to the unformatted value, and thereby set the value of the data source.
trans-unit.target: 然后可以重置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A>到未格式化的属性值，并因此设置数据源的值。

trans-unit.source: To determine the type of the data source, examine the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.DesiredType%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定数据源的类型，请检查<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.DesiredType%2A>属性值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>, adds a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventHandler> delegate to both the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format> events, and uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DataBindings%2A> property to add the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection> of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>，将添加<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventHandler>委托<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format>事件，并使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DataBindings%2A>属性来添加<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控件。

trans-unit.source: The `DecimalToCurrencyString` event delegate, which is added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format> event, uses the <xref:System.Decimal.ToString%2A> method to format the bound value (a <xref:System.Decimal> type) as currency.
trans-unit.target: `DecimalToCurrencyString`添加到的事件委托<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format>事件，使用<xref:System.Decimal.ToString%2A>方法来设置格式的绑定的值 (<xref:System.Decimal>类型) 为货币。

trans-unit.source: The `CurrencyStringToDecimal` event delegate, which is added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse> event, converts the value displayed by the control back to the <xref:System.Decimal> type.
trans-unit.target: `CurrencyStringToDecimal`添加到的事件委托<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse>事件，将由控件显示的值转换回<xref:System.Decimal>类型。
